text: Corozal Bay is an electoral constituency in the Corozal District represented in the House of Representatives of the National Assembly of Belize since 2008 by Pablo Marin of the United Democratic Party. ==Profile== The Corozal Bay constituency was one of 10 new seats created for the 1984 general election. By far the smallest of the four constituencies in the Corozal District geographically, Corozal Bay consists of most of the district's capital, Corozal Town.Belize election maps, Psephos - Adam Carr's Election Archive.
